elements.html:
Participation Consent

Before proceeding, please review the following information about your participation in this survey:

Your Rights as a Participant:

  • Participation is completely voluntary
  • You may skip any question you prefer not to answer
  • You may exit the survey at any time without penalty
  • Your responses will remain anonymous and confidential

Data Use: The information collected will be used for research and analysis purposes only. No personally identifiable information will be shared.
